org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

Class EncFSPBKDF2Provider

  • java.lang.Object

    Abstract class for providing a custom PBKDF2 implementation

    • Method Detail

      • doPBKDF2

        public abstract byte[] doPBKDF2(int passwordLen,
              String password,
              int saltLen,
              byte[] salt,
              int iterations,
              int keyLen)
        Parameters:
        passwordLen - Length of the password provided in 'password'
        password - Password to hash
        saltLen - Length of the salt provided in 'salt'
        salt - Salt data
        iterations - Number of PBKDF2 iterations to perform
        keyLen - Desired length of the resulting key material in bytes
        Returns:
        Byte array containing the result of the PBKDF2 computation. null if the computation failed.
